definitions.definition: The duration during which a radio or television program (or part of one) is transmitted .
examples: Can you get me some airtime for my latest single?

definitions.definition: The duration spent talking during a conversation.
The chargeable use of a mobile phone , either in minutes or in units dependent on the use or traffic.
The period of freefall after jumping.
The period during which a person riding a rollercoaster or similar ride experiences a feeling of weightlessness .

main_definition: The duration during which a radio or television program (or part of one) is transmitted .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) The duration spent talking during a conversation.
The chargeable use of a mobile phone , either in minutes or in units dependent on the use or traffic.
The period of freefall after jumping.
The period during which a person riding a rollercoaster or similar ride experiences a feeling of weightlessness .
